author: brane
msg: Fix svn:mime-type validation -- look only at the media type.
mark all error messages for translation.
(svn_mime_type_validate): Compute the length of the media type
string and check only that part. Modify an error message slightly.
(svn_mime_type_is_binary): Compute the length of the media type
string and check only that part.

author: brane
msg: Print directory name as '.' instead of '' when specifying '.' to

author: jpieper
msg: Issue #1797: Return a error when attempting to commit a non-recursive
directory deletion.  Since attempting this actually breaks working
copies now, it is safer to just disable it.
(svn_client_commit): When checking to make sure all the targets are
part of the same working copy, also error out if any of the
targets is a deleted or replaced directory.

author: jpieper
msg: Apparently, when installing new files during a checkout, the timestamp
is set on a file before the properties are completely installed.
Therefore, using svn_wc__get_special won't work to determine special
status.  This patch fixes that case by doing an actual stat to
determine if the on disk path is a special one.  If it is, do not set
if the on disk file is special before trying to set a timestamp.

author: breser
msg: Set svn:mime-type to proper mime-type for a variety of files.
